task.title: Archive Project
task.shortdesc: Create a .zip archive of a Phon project in the workspace backups folder. This is especially useful as a method of backing up your corpus before any major change.

step.cmd: Mouse over the project you wish to archive in the Project List pane.
step.stepresult: Two buttons will appear next to your project name; Create .zip archive of phon project... and Show project in file system viewer.

step.cmd: Click Create .zip archive of phon project.... Alternately, right-click (CTRL+click) on your project and choose Archive project from the context menu.
step.stepresult: A .zip archive of your project will be created in your workspace backups folder, with the current date affixed to its filename.
